Title: 1. The Raid: Redemption
Descriptions: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.
Stars: Iko Uwais, Ananda George, Ray Sahetapy

Title: 2. The Raid 2
Descriptions: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.
Stars: Iko Uwais, Yayan Ruhian, Arifin Putra

Title: 3. Manusia Setengah Salmon
Descriptions: Dika and his family want to move out of his house for a reason, and Dika doesn't feel good about it. But as time goes, his feeling is getting better about his new house while he met his high school crush after a long time.
Stars: Raditya Dika, Kimberly Ryder, Eriska Rein

Title: 4. Gie
Descriptions: Soe Hok Gie is an activist who lived in the sixties. Set in the darkest era of Indonesian modern history, "Gie" is an interpretation of what happened based on his journal.
Stars: Nicholas Saputra, Jonathan Mulia, Thomas Nawilis

Title: 5. The Act of Killing
Descriptions: A documentary which challenges former Indonesian death-squad leaders to reenact their mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.
Stars: Anwar Congo, Herman Koto, Syamsul Arifin

Title: 6. The Look of Silence
Descriptions: A family that survived the genocide in Indonesia confronts the men who killed one of their brothers.
Stars: Adi Rukun, M.Y. Basrun, Volker Hanisch

Title: 7. Laskar Pelangi
Descriptions: In the 1970s, a group of 10 students struggles with poverty and develop hopes for the future in Gantong Village on the farming and tin mining island of Belitung off the east coast of Sumatra.
Stars: Cut Mini Theo, Zulfanny, Ikranagara

Title: 8. Habibie & Ainun
Descriptions: This movie is based on the memoir written by the 3rd President of Indonesia and one of the world-famous engineer, B.J. Habibie about his wife, Hasri Ainun Habibie.
Stars: Reza Rahadian, Bunga Citra Lestari, Tio Pakusadewo

Title: 9. What's Up with Cinta?
Descriptions: A popular girl has to choose whether she wants to stay as a part of her clique or fall for the brooding literature-loving boy in her school.
Stars: Dian Sastrowardoyo, Nicholas Saputra, Ladya Cheryl

Title: 10. Sherina's Adventure
Descriptions: Adventure of a little girl who just moved to a new town and meet a new friends.
Stars: Sherina Munaf, Derby Romero, Didi Petet

Title: 11. Catatan Akhir Sekolah
Descriptions: A journey of three students for making a short documentary movie about their school as a last farewell tribute to every single thing of their memories in High School.
Stars: Joanna Alexandra, Vino G. Bastian, Marcel Chandrawinata

Title: 12. Macabre
Descriptions: Six friends on a road trip stumble upon a strange girl and her enigmatic mother. The mother invites them for dinner, trapping and hunting them. Her family systematically eliminates the friends one by one through a nefarious ritual.
Stars: Shareefa Daanish, Julie Estelle, Ario Bayu

Title: 13. Naga Bonar
Descriptions: Naga Bonar is a pickpocket. During the withdrawal of the Japanese occupying forces from Indonesia in 1945 he declares himself a general of the Liberation Forces. Soon a mask becomes his true self, and he becomes a true soldier and patriot.
Stars: Deddy Mizwar, Nurul Arifin, Wawan Wanisar

Title: 14. Naga Bonar Jadi 2
Descriptions: A sequel to the 1986 movie "Nagabonar" telling the story about the relationship between Nagabonar, a pickpocket who became a self-proclaimed general during Indonesia's war of independence, and his only son Bonaga.
Stars: Deddy Mizwar, Tora Sudiro, Wulan Guritno

Title: 15. Warkop DKI Reborn: Jangkrik Boss Part 1
Descriptions: Dono, Kasino, and Indro are back in action. Now, they join a private institution called CHIPS. Even though they are passionate about serving the community, they also continue to cause problems because of their silly and funny actions.
Stars: Abimana Aryasatya, Vino G. Bastian, Tora Sudiro

Title: 16. Garuda di Dadaku
Descriptions: Talented 12-year-old boy dreams of becoming a great soccer player despite his loving grandfather's stern disapproval.
Stars: Emir Mahira, Aldo Tansani, Marsha Aruan

Title: 17. Soekarno
Descriptions: This movie follows the life of Soekarno, the first president of the Republic of Indonesia, from his childhood until he managed to proclaimed Indonesian freedom with M. Hatta in 1945.
Stars: Ario Bayu, Muhammad Abbe, Moch. Achir

Title: 18. Guru Bangsa Tjokroaminoto
Descriptions: In 1912, Javanese activist Omar Said Tjokroaminoto (Reza Rahadian) co-founds the Sarekat Islam party to fight injustices of the Dutch East Indies' colonial regime.
Stars: Reza Rahadian, Christoffer Nelwan, Putri Ayudya

Title: 19. 5 cm
Descriptions: Five best friends try to find out what true friendship is by climbing Mount Semeru, the highest peak in Java.
Stars: Herjunot Ali, Raline Shah, Fedi Nuril

Title: 20. Verses of Love
Descriptions: A man who try to get through a complicated relationship in the Islamic way.
Stars: Fedi Nuril, Rianti Cartwright, Carissa Putri
